values.name: AllowToAddGuests
values.description: Flag indicating if guests are allowed in a specific Unified Group.

value.description: Settings for a specific Unified Group

values.name: EnableAccessCheckForPrivilegedApplicationUpdates
values.description: Flag indicating if access check for application privileged updates is turned on.

value.description:
Setting templates define the different settings that can be used for the associated ObjectSettings. This template defines
        settings that can be used for managing tenant-wide application behavior.

values.name: BannedPasswordCheckOnPremisesMode
values.description: How should we enforce password policy check in on-premises system.

values.name: EnableBannedPasswordCheckOnPremises
values.description: Flag indicating if the banned password check is turned on or not for on-premises system.

values.name: EnableBannedPasswordCheck
values.description: Flag indicating if the banned password check for tenant specific banned password list is turned on or not.

values.name: LockoutDurationInSeconds
values.description: The duration in seconds of the initial lockout period.

values.name: LockoutThreshold
values.description: The number of failed login attempts before the first lockout period begins.

values.name: BannedPasswordList
values.description: A tab-delimited banned password list.

value.description:
Setting templates define the different settings that can be used for the associated ObjectSettings. This template defines
        settings that can be used for managing tenant-wide password rule settings.

values.name: NewUnifiedGroupWritebackDefault
values.description: Default value of IsWritebackEnabled property for newly created Unified Groups.

values.name: EnableMIPLabels
values.description: Flag indicating whether Microsoft Information Protection labels can be assigned to Unified Groups.

values.name: CustomBlockedWordsList
values.description: A comma-delimited list of blocked words for Unified Group displayName and mailNickName.

values.name: EnableMSStandardBlockedWords
values.description: A flag indicating whether or not to enable the Microsoft Standard list of blocked words for Unified Group displayName and mailNickName.

values.name: ClassificationDescriptions
values.description: A comma-delimited list of structured strings describing the classification values in the ClassificationList. The structure of the string is: Value: Description

values.name: DefaultClassification
values.description: The classification value to be used by default for Unified Group creation.

values.name: PrefixSuffixNamingRequirement
values.description: A structured string describing how a Unified Group displayName and mailNickname should be structured. Please refer to docs to discover how to structure a valid requirement.

values.name: AllowGuestsToBeGroupOwner
values.description: Flag indicating if guests are allowed to be owner in any Unified Group.

values.name: AllowGuestsToAccessGroups
values.description: Flag indicating if guests are allowed to access any Unified Group resources.

values.name: GuestUsageGuidelinesUrl
values.description: A link to the Group Usage Guidelines for guests.

values.name: GroupCreationAllowedGroupId
values.description: Guid of the security group that is always allowed to create Unified Groups.

values.name: AllowToAddGuests
values.description: Flag indicating if guests are allowed in any Unified Group.

values.name: UsageGuidelinesUrl
values.description: A link to the Group Usage Guidelines.

values.name: ClassificationList
values.description: A comma-delimited list of valid classification values that can be applied to Unified Groups.

values.name: EnableGroupCreation
values.description: Flag indicating if group creation feature is on.

value.description:
Setting templates define the different settings that can be used for the associated ObjectSettings. This template defines
        settings that can be used for Unified Groups.

values.name: CustomBlockedSubStringsList
values.description: A comma delimited list of substring reserved words to block for application display names.

values.name: CustomBlockedWholeWordsList
values.description: A comma delimited list of reserved words to block for application display names.

value.description:
Setting templates define the different settings that can be used for the associated ObjectSettings. This template defines
        settings that can be used for managing tenant-wide prohibited names settings.

values.name: CustomConditionalAccessPolicyUrl
values.description: Custom conditional access policy url.

value.description:
Setting templates define the different settings that can be used for the associated ObjectSettings. This template defines
        settings that can be used for managing tenant-wide custom policy settings.

values.name: CustomAllowedSubStringsList
values.description: A comma delimited list of substring reserved words to allow for application display names.

values.name: CustomAllowedWholeWordsList
values.description: A comma delimited list of whole reserved words to allow for application display names.

values.name: DoNotValidateAgainstTrademark
values.description: Flag indicating if prohibited names validation against trademark global list is disabled.

value.description:
Setting templates define the different settings that can be used for the associated ObjectSettings. This template defines
        settings that can be used for managing tenant-wide prohibited names restricted settings.

values.name: EnableGroupSpecificConsent
values.description: Flag indicating if groups owners are allowed to grant group specific permissions.

values.name: BlockUserConsentForRiskyApps
values.description: Flag indicating if user consent will be blocked when a risky request is detected. Administrators will still be able to consent to apps considered risky.

values.name: EnableAdminConsentRequests
values.description: Flag indicating if users will be able to request admin consent when they are unable to grant consent to an app themselves.

values.name: ConstrainGroupSpecificConsentToMembersOfGroupId
values.description: If EnableGroupSpecificConsent is set to “True” and this is set to a security group object ID, members (both direct and transitive) of the group identified will be authorized to grant group-specific permissions to the groups they own.

value.description:
Setting templates define the different settings that can be used for the associated ObjectSettings. This template defines
       settings that can be used for managing tenant-wide consent policy.
